channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Lancaster University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: DisC-GS: Discontinuity-aware Gaussian Splatting
item.description: DisC-GS enhances Gaussian Splatting for real-time novel view synthesis by accurately rendering image discontinuities and boundaries, improving visual quality.

item.title: Markovian Flow Matching: Accelerating MCMC with Continuous Normalizing Flows
item.description: Adaptive MCMC with CNFs accelerates probabilistic inference by combining local and flow-informed transition kernels, achieving state-of-the-art results efficiently.
